{{also|gunstig}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From the noun {{suffix|de|Gunst|ig}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈɡʏnstɪç/}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[favorable]] # [[convenient]] # [[good value]], [[cheap]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|günstig|günstiger|günstigst}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|cheap}} {{l|de|billig}}, {{l|de|preiswert}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|ungünstig}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
